smile.validation

Class Bootstrap

  • java.lang.Object
    • smile.validation.Bootstrap

  • public class Bootstrap
extends java.lang.Object
    The bootstrap is a general tool for assessing statistical accuracy. The basic idea is to randomly draw datasets with replacement from the training data, each sample the same size as the original training set. This is done many times (say k = 100), producing k bootstrap datasets. Then we refit the model to each of the bootstrap datasets and examine the behavior of the fits over the k replications.
    Author:
    Haifeng Li
